content: No, non c'è una funzione per l'esportazione del layout. Volendo puoi proporre la tua idea qui -> https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas

content: Se la firma è caricata da remoto (anzichè inclusa nella mail) Thunderbird la blocca per ragioni di sicurezza. Puoi disattivare -a tuo rischio- questa funzione sia per la singola mail che per uno specifico mittente. E puoi anche disabilitarla del tutto (sconsigliato). Qui trovi come procedere -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/contenuti-remoti-nei-messaggi
creator: @next

content: If menu bar is not visible, press the alt key. Then, click view>headers>all

content: Just set the account up as though you would be using SMTP. SInce you will not use it, there should be no problem.

content:
There is an issue because i cannot connect from my mobile to SMTP server so... Thunderbird says the config is wrong (IT cannot connect) and im stuck. As there is no "force" or "oh jest go forward without checking" button.

So my issue is just that there is NO available SMTP to connect to.

Also i cant understand why thunderbird assumes that there is always a pair imap/pop+SMTP

I have multiple accounts with only receiving emails AMD few with only sending (noreply@ for example) where incoming mails goes info catch-all pool.

Maybe i just should stay away from mobile and be stuck on pc mailing like "good old days" ;-)

content: I think this is a server error. Try logging on to web account and check to see if any malformed messaged are there and delete them.

content: Mail.com requires a premium account to use an email client such as thunderbird. If you prefer to use an email client, such as Thunderbird (which is obviously our preference), you need a premium account. If you want a free account, you might consider, gmail, outlook, or gmx.
creator: davidsk

content: This may work. highlight folder , rightclick, select properties and then click 'repair'
creator: davidsk

content: - click 'account settings' - highlight the account to be removed - slightly below the accounts on left side of pane is 'Account Settings. click the 'remove account' option.
